articles.title: Bitcoin returns to $42K as bets start favoring ‘short squeeze’ higher for BTC - Cointelegraph
articles.description: BTC price action could surprise everyone with a "short squeeze" and bullish open interest reset.
articles.content:
Bitcoin (BTC) broke through $42,000 on Jan. 11 as expectations of a fresh short squeeze mounted.

articles.title: Goldman's David Kostin says a tech disconnect is the 'single greatest mispricing' in U.S. stocks - CNBC
articles.description: A tech stock derating likely has further to go, according to Goldman Sachs' Chief U.S. Equity Strategist David Kostin.
articles.content:
LONDON A substantial disconnect in the U.S. tech sector is top of mind for investors in 2022, according to Goldman Sachs' Chief U.S. Equity Strategist David Kostin.

articles.title: Asian stocks, dollar hunt for direction as investors look to Fed policy - Reuters
articles.description: Asian equities and the dollar struggled to find direction on Tuesday as investors awaited Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's appearance before the Senate Banking Committee, hoping for clues to the timing of expected policy tightening.
